title: About Us
content:
ROG is a chain of stores specializing in the sale of consoles, games and toy equipment. It was founded in 2007 when the first store was opened in Belgrade, and today ROG has eight stores - five in Belgrade, two in Novi Sad, one in Kragujevac and a web shop that has been carrying an official e-trustmark quality certificate since 2016.

In addition to the basic programs of consoles, games and equipment for PC, Sony Playstation, Microsoft XBOX and Nintendo platforms, ROG offers a wide selection of items related to e-sports. In the world of sports, this discipline has long been in the rank, if not ahead of traditional sports. Gaming as the basic commitment of ROG determines the rest of the range - an accompanying program with gaming themes: action figures, pendants, cups, bags, backpacks, gaming chairs, tables ...

We are especially proud that for many years we have been the only authorized seller and distributor of SteelSeries, a leader in the production of gaming equipment (mice, keyboards, pads and headphones). We are also the distributor of the e-sports brand Zowie - gaming division of the company BANQ since 2018 - simplicity and perfection are what adorn this brand and that is why they are the most common choice of professional players. In addition to mice, keyboards, headphones and pads, this brand is also famous for gaming monitors.
Also from the end of 2018, ROG is the official distributor of Roccat, another premium gaming brand.

One benefit we offer to console owners - we buy and sell used console games. If a game is too much for you and just takes up space on the shelf, come to one of our stores to buy the game. If a game is expensive for you, check if we offer it as used and you can go cheaper.

We are recognized as the ultimate selling point for everyone who has a gaming lifestyle. ROG trumps are: the largest selection of games and equipment, trained staff, new releases always and on time.
